name: Kodalium
description:
Kodalium

As a new manager of a mining company, you will oversee the mining operations across the world gathering valuable resources everything from Gold to Copper to Lithium…etc.  Build the mining equipment you need and vehicles to transport your goods to processing units.  Use new innovative methods of mining resources such as drones and automatic mining blasters, when you complete the level tasks you will be promoted and get to select other mining operations across the world each one presenting new and unique challenges.

This is a demo version v0.0.2 and shows a basic setup on what you will be doing.

Options in the game are currently limited.  It is recommended to play this demo with a computer with a fair processing capability and a screen resolution minimum of 1920x1080 or 16:9 aspect ratio.

 

Development of the game is open to feedback, anything creative of something pulled right out of science fiction let me know your thoughts.
